aboutme1.p: or also known under the nickname "arminmiau". I am {age} years old and from Austria. Computertechnologies, software development and video games are my passion.

aboutme2.p2: in the field of informatics. At this school I'm learning programming in languages Java (as Command Line, Java Swing/FX and on Android) and C# (WPF, LINQ, ASP.NET), web development with HTML, CSS, JS/TS and Svelte, networking, database engineering and project management.

aboutme3.p: Back when I joined the voluntary firefighters at an age of 10, it was only because of my old friends, however since when I became an active firefighter instead of a youth firefighter my reason to stay has been to be able to help people in need.
aboutme3.li3: Radio/communication and tasks in operational control achievement badge in bronze
aboutme3.li4: Fire service achievement badge in bronze

aboutme4.p: and I have been planning my own game for a long time. However, I haven't made any mentionable progress in the development. I want to make a survival craft open world rpg, with a class system inspired by games like World of Warcraft, Guild Wars 2 and New World.
